DOC.brief_summary: The study objective is to compare the clinical outcomes using wavefront guided PRK with iris registration and conventional laser PRK using FDA-approved laser technology on the same patient.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Conventional and Custom Photorefractive Keratectomy (PRK)
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergoing bilateral PRK on the same day will have one eye randomly assigned to custom wavefront guided PRK and the fellow eye treated with conventional PRK.
DOC.criteria: Patients deemed to be suitable candidates for bilateral PRK Patients desiring monovision correction rather than bilateral distance correction
